overview: OMEN tells the story of one woman’s exploration of bravery and perseverance, intimately following her as she takes risks and overcomes fears. The film tells the story of our shared interdependence – and the beauty of surrendering to the unknown. Creating performance art during the unprecedented COVID-19 pandemic has taken DSA’s innovation and artistry to a new height. DSA embarked on an exhilarating dance film project – OMEN – filmed in the dramatic landscapes of Northern Arizona.
title: OMEN
